attributes.action: Teachers, school and childcare staff to be prioritised for the covid 19 vaccine
attributes.additional_details: With most of the country in Tier 4 and the remainder in tier 3, many services, shops and places are now closed to ensure people are safe. As a primary school teacher in early years with no social distancing possible, I believe ALL adults working with children should have their lives protected by being prioritised amongst other groups to receive the covid vaccine. Teachers want to work but want to be safe and keep their families safe.
attributes.background: Include teachers, school staff, childcare workers  including those in early years settings and special schools in the priority list to receive the covid 19 vaccine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
